thread.title: A Neighborhood with Character: Rainy Days in Mickey’s Toontown at Disneyland Park
thread.title_full: A Neighborhood with Character: Rainy Days in Mickey’s Toontown at Disneyland Park

author: Erin Glover
title: A Neighborhood with Character: Rainy Days in Mickey’s Toontown at Disneyland Park
text:
It’s been a wet week here in Southern California, but a little rain never spoils the fun in Mickey’s Toontown!

Rain drops on the hood of your car? No problem! Just watch out for mailboxes …

Wet streets give Mickey’s Toontown a lovely glow after dark, don’t you think?
What’s your favorite land to visit during a rainy day at Disneyland park? Tell us in the comments!
